scripts.clean: npm run clean:images && npm run clean:volumes
scripts.migrate:save: docker exec -it prisma prisma2 migrate save --name first-migration --experimental
scripts.migrate:up: docker exec -it prisma prisma2 migrate up --experimental
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:save && npm run migrate:up
scripts.seed: docker exec -it prisma npm run seed
scripts.generate: docker exec -it frontend npm run generate
